16 package acl
17 
18 import akka.actor.{Actor, ActorLogging, ActorRef}
19 
20 /** Trait defining behavior for an actor that is party to some
21   * [[edsl.commitments.Contract Contract]].
22   *
23   * `Counterparty` actors communicate with other `Counterparty` actors using
24   * [[ContractLike ContractLike]] actors as "channels."
25   */
26 trait Counterparty {
27   this: Actor with ActorLogging =>
28 
29   /** The act of breaking the terms of some existing [[edsl.commitments.Contract Contract]].
30     *
31     * @param receiver a [[ContractLike]] actor whose underlying
32     *                 [[edsl.commitments.Contract Contract]] the `Counterparty`
33     *                 actor wishes to break.
34     * @note When a `Counterparty` actor breaks the terms of some existing
35     *       [[edsl.commitments.Contract Contract]] it becomes in "breach
36     *       of contract." The `Counterparty` actor sending [[ContractBroken]]
37     *       is informing the receiver that it no longer has the intention of
38     *       performing the actions specified in the receiver's underlying
39     *       [[edsl.commitments.Contract Contract]].
40     */
41   def breakContract(receiver: ActorRef): Unit = {
42     receiver ! ContractBroken(self, receiver)
43   }
44 
45 
46 
47 }

42 4 1733 - 1774 ApplyToImplicitArgs akka.actor.ScalaActorRef.! akka.this.actor.`package`.actorRef2Scala(receiver).!(acl.this.`package`.ContractBroken.apply(Counterparty.this.self, receiver))(Counterparty.this.self)
